data.name: Monty
data.description: Monty enjoys chicken treats and cuddling while watching Seinfeld.

data.name: Jubilee
data.description: Jubilee enjoys thoughtful discussions by the campfire.

data.name: Beezy
data.description: Beezy's favorite past-time is helping you choose your brand color.

data.name: Mochi
data.description: Mochi is the perfect "rubbery ducky" debugging pup, always listening.

data.name: Brewery
data.description: Brewery loves fetching you your favorite homebrew.

data.name: Lucy
data.description: Picture yourself in a boat on a river, Lucy is a pup with kaleidoscope eyes.

data.name: Astro
data.description: Is it a bird? A plane? No, it's Astro blasting off into your heart!

data.name: Boo
data.description: Boo is just a teddy bear in disguise. What he lacks in grace, he makes up in charm.

data.name: Pippa
data.description: Pippa likes to look out the window and write pup-poetry

data.name: Coco
data.description: Coco enjoys getting pampered at the local puppy spa.

data.name: Brody
data.description: Brody is a good boy, waiting for your next command.

data.name: Stella
data.description: Stella! Calm and always up for a challenge, she's the perfect companion.
